title: Mx Claus Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: gender neutral santa medium light skin tone
christmas figure medium light skin tone
description: Represents Mx Claus, a gender-neutral figure associated with giving gifts and spreading holiday cheer, depicted with medium-light skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, Mx Claus, represented with a medium-light skin tone, is depicted with a warm and festive spirit, featuring a cheerful expression and a traditional red and white suit. The emoji showcases Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded edges, giving the character a friendly and approachable appearance. This inclusive representation of a holiday figure embodies generosity, joy, and the spirit of giving, perfect for spreading holiday cheer in your digital communications on Apple devices.
